fixes.name: T|F
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced Tableau AVG([Sales]) with DAX AVERAGE('sample_-_superstore (1)'[Sales]) and converted the IF ... THEN TRUE/ELSE FALSE to IF(condition, TRUE(), FALSE()). The expression returns a boolean measure based on the aggregated sales.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation uses aggregation (AVG), so it should be created as a measure.
